conbody.p:
The meta-dictionary is the catalog of the Triple'A Plus Core data repository. Once imported into Design Studio, it consists of a package that contains the following domain model files:
Business types: List of business types supported by Triple'A Plus Core. This file is static and cannot be customized.
Enumerations: List of Triple'A Plus Core enumeration with their enumerated values. These are known as permitted values in the Triple'A Plus Core vocabulary.
Entities: Triple'A Plus Core data model itself, describing classes and their associations. This is a logical model conforming to the Triple'A Plus Core meta-dictionary. Attributes are based on business types or enumerations.
These imported data cannot be edited as Triple'A Plus Core is the only source.
